title: The M50 Motorway Murder:  Episode 21
description: "Mrs Wilks....Mrs Wilks".  It was June 1988 and the Police Operator could not understand why the pregnant lady who had called for help after breaking down on the M50 motorway was not answering.   Tragically, nobody would speak with 22 year old Marie Wilks again....On this edition of the UK True Crime Podcast we look at just what happened to Marie Wilks.  Any why.....
